fixed.message: ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '...\????.txt'
fixed.cause: JSZip decoded Shift-JIS zip filenames as CP437, producing garbled paths that Windows can't handle
fixed.fix: Use custom decodeFileName in JSZip.loadAsync() that tries UTF-8 → Shift-JIS → GBK → EUC-KR → Big5

fixed.message: Failed to load texture '颜赤.tga': Input file contains unsupported image format
fixed.cause: sharp does not support TGA format
fixed.fix: Added custom TGA decoder (uncompressed + RLE, BGR→RGBA, vertical flip)

fixed.message: Failed to load texture '31.bmp': Input file contains unsupported image format
fixed.cause: sharp fails on some BMP variants common in MMD models
fixed.fix: Added BMP fallback decoder (24/32/8-bit, row padding, BGR→RGBA)

fixed.cause: 上半身 mapped to both spine and chest, sharing the same glTF node index
fixed.fix: Each PMX bone maps to exactly one VRM humanoid bone. Dynamic spine chain: 1 bone→spine, 2 bones→spine+upperChest, 3 bones→spine+chest+upperChest

fixed.message: TypeScript spring values (stiffiness, gravityPower) differ from Python output
fixed.cause: TypeScript joints included rotation_limit_min/max via spread operator, Python did not. This caused _rotation_limit_range to compute non-zero avg_range in TS, producing different gravity and stiffiness values
fixed.fix: Explicitly list joint fields in TS to match Python (exclude rotation_limit_min/max)

known_limitations.description: chest removed from VRM_REQUIRED_BONES (16 required instead of 17). Models with only 2 spine bones map to spine+upperChest, skipping chest.
Supported: PNG, JPEG, WebP, TIFF, GIF (via sharp), TGA, BMP (custom decoders). Unsupported: DDS, SPA, SPH (sphere maps).
